snippet.title: Touhou Genso Rondo for PlayStation®4 in Asia - Trailer -
snippet.description:
Touhou Project Fangame "Touhou Genso Rondo" is now released for PlayStation®4 in Asia!
Bring yourself to the top of the beautiful danmaku play!
This is not just an ordinary shooter... it's a danmaku-shooter style fighting game, where both you and the enemy are bosses!
Combine the projectiles of variety as you like, and invent your original pattern of danmaku!
Single player mode is of great volume, including story mode, arcade mode, boss rush mode, and much more!
Of course, we have both offline/online battle mode, too!
Even more, we have some special campaigns coming up!
Cast yourself into the fantastic world of danmaku battle!

Official Site
　http://www.cubetype.com/works/gensoRondoPs4/asia/

Now on sale!
Available on PlayStation®Store

Hong Kong
　https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-hk/games/touhou-genso-rondo/cid=JP0704-CUSA02582_00-ASIA000000000000
Indonesia
　https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-id/games/touhou-genso-rondo/cid=JP0704-CUSA02582_00-ASIA000000000000
Korea
　https://store.playstation.com/#!/ko-kr/%ea%b2%8c%ec%9e%84/%eb%8f%99%eb%b0%a9-%ed%94%84%eb%a1%9c%ec%a0%9d%ed%8a%b8-%e3%80%8a%ed%99%98%ec%83%81%ec%9d%98-%eb%a1%a0%eb%8f%84%e3%80%8b/cid=JP0704-CUSA02582_00-ASIA000000000000
Malaysia
　https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-my/games/touhou-genso-rondo/cid=JP0704-CUSA02582_00-ASIA000000000000
Singapore
　https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-sg/games/touhou-genso-rondo/cid=JP0704-CUSA02582_00-ASIA000000000000
Taiwan
　https://store.playstation.com/#!/zh-hant-tw/%e9%81%8a%e6%88%b2/touhou-genso-rondo/cid=JP0704-CUSA02582_00-ASIA000000000000
Thailand
　https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-th/games/touhou-genso-rondo/cid=JP0704-CUSA02582_00-ASIA000000000000

Official Twitter
　https://twitter.com/doujin_en
